alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southeast Johnson County; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 1:58PM MDT until March 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches around Cody, 2 to 3 inches near Thermopolis, up to 2 inches in the eastern Bighorn Basin, and 1 to 2 inches across northern Johnson County. Occasional north wind gusts 25 to 35 mph until late Saturday evening over northern portions of the Bighorn Basin and Johnson County. * WHERE...The Bighorn Basin, Cody Foothills, and Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Road travel along Wyoming Highway 120 and on US 14A and US 16 heading out of Cody will be impacted by reduced visibility and icy surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Portions of eastern Bighorn Basin may see very little snowfall.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
